House_Lannister.name: House Lannister
coat of arms: A gold lion, on a crimson field
Gules, a lion or
title: King of the Rock
(formerly)
Lord of Casterly Rock
Shield of Lannisport
Warden of the West

House_Algood.name: House Algood
coat of arms: A golden wreath, on a blue field with a gold border
Azure, a garland of laurel within a bordure or

House_Banefort.name: House Banefort
coat of arms: A black hooded man, on a grey field, within a fiery tressure
Cendr e, a hooded man sable within a tressure rayonn  along the outer edge gules
title: Lord of Banefort
Hooded King
(formerly)

House_Bettley.name: House Bettley
coat of arms: Three blue beetles, on a gold field
Or, three beetles azure

House_Brax.name: House Brax
coat of arms: A purple unicorn, on a silver field
Argent, a unicorn rampant purpure
House_Brax.title: Lord of Hornvale

House_Broom.name: House Broom
coat of arms: A silver helm crested with a sprig of broom, on a checkered black and green field
Chequy sable and vert, a helm argent, crested with a sprig of broom proper

House_Crakehall.name: House Crakehall
coat of arms: A brindled black and white boar on a brown field
(Brunâtre, a boar brindled sable and argent)
House_Crakehall.title: Lord of Crakehall

House_Doggett.name: House Doggett
coat of arms: Per bend, a white unicorn on a green field, a black raven on a white field
(Per bend vert and argent, in sinister chief a unicorn of the second, in dexter base a raven sable)

House_Drox.name: House Drox
coat of arms: Three black crossbows, on a gold field with a black border
Or, three crossbows within a bordure sable

House_Estren.name: House Estren
coat of arms: A green saltire between four red double-headed eagles, on a white field
Argent, a saltire vert between four double-headed eagles displayed gules
House_Estren.title: Lord of Wyndhall

House_Falwell.name: House Falwell
coat of arms: A fool in red and gold motley juggling five suns, on a black field
Sable, a fool proper clothed in motley gules and or, juggling five suns-in-splendour of the last

House_Farman.name: House Farman
coat of arms: Three silver ships on a blue field with a border of crimson and gold
Azure, three galleys argent within a bordure compony gules and or
title: Lord of Fair Isle
King
of Fair Isle (formerly)

House_Ferren.name: House Ferren
coat of arms: Per saltire, checkered red and gold, a silver and black ferret on a green field
Per saltire chequy gules and or and vert, in each flank point a ferret argent and sable

House_Foote.name: House Foote
coat of arms: A copper dagger across a black chevron, on a white field
Argent, a chevron reversed sable, surmounted by a dagger erect tenn

House_Garner.name: House Garner
coat of arms: Three grey owls upon white plates, on a green field
Vert, three plates, each charged with an owl close affront  cendr e

House_Hamell.name: House Hamell
coat of arms: An erminois maunch, on a pink field with an erminois border
(Rose, a maunch within a bordure erminois)

House_Hawthorne.name: House Hawthorne
coat of arms: A ring of black thorns and a ring of pink flowers, interlocked, on a green field
(Vert, an annulet of thorns sable embracing another of flowers rose)

House_Jast.name: House Jast
coat of arms: An inverted yellow pall between three yellow lions' heads, on a black field
Sable, a pall reversed between three lions' heads erased or

House_Kenning_of_Kayce.name: House Kenning of Kayce
coat of arms: Four sunbursts counterchanged on a quartered orange and black field
Quarterly tenn  and sable, four suns-in-splendour counterchanged
title: Lord of Kayce
Knight of Kayce
(formerly)

House_Lefford.name: House Lefford
coat of arms: A golden inverted pile on a sky-blue field, a yellow sun in the first
Bleu celeste, a pile reversed or, in canton a sun-in-splendor of the same
House_Lefford.title: Lord of the Golden Tooth

House_Lydden.name: House Lydden
coat of arms: A white badger on a per pale green and brown field
(Per pale vert and brunâtre, a badger argent)
House_Lydden.title: Lord of the Deep Den

House_Marbrand.name: House Marbrand
coat of arms: An orange burning tree, on a smoky field
Cendr e, a tree in flame tenn
House_Marbrand.title: Lord of Ashemark

House_Moreland.name: House Moreland
coat of arms: Per pale barry russet and green
(Per pale barry brunâtre and vert)

House_Myatt.name: House Myatt
coat of arms: A spotted yellow-and-black treecat, on a mud-brown field
(Brunâtre, a treecat or pellet )

House_Payne.name: House Payne
coat of arms: Gold coins in the checks of a checkered purple and white field
Chequy purpure and argent, each chequer charged with a bezant

House_Plumm.name: House Plumm
coat of arms: Three purple roundels, on a gold field
Or, three golpes

House_Prester.name: House Prester
coat of arms: A red ox, on an ermine field
Ermine, an ox passant gules
House_Prester.title: Lord of Feastfires

House_Sarsfield.name: House Sarsfield
coat of arms: A green arrow on a white bend, on a green field
Vert, on a bend argent an arrow of the field, point to dexter chief

House_Sarwyck.name: House Sarwyck
House_Sarwyck.coat of arms: A broken silver sword on red (Gules, a broken sword argent)
House_Sarwyck.words: Family is Hope, Protect it Always

House_Serrett.name: House Serrett
coat of arms: A peacock in his pride, on a cream field
(Carnation, a peacock in his pride proper)
House_Serrett.title: Lord of Silverhill

House_Stackspear.name: House Stackspear
coat of arms: Two crossed black spears, on a checkered silver and gold field
Chequy argent and or, two spears in saltire sable

House_Turnberry.name: House Turnberry
coat of arms: Nine strawberries on a white saltire, on a field of green and red vairy in point
(Vairy-in-point vert and gules, on a saltire argent nine strawberries proper)

House_Westerling.name: House Westerling
coat of arms: Six seashells, white on sand
Or, six escallops argent
House_Westerling.title: Lord of the Crag

House_Yarwyck.name: House Yarwyck
coat of arms: Two bronze halberds crossed between four red diamonds, on a white field
(Argent, between four lozenges gules two halberds saltirewise bronze)

House_Clegane.name: House Clegane
coat of arms: Three dogs on a yellow field
Or, three dogs courant in pale sable
House_Clegane.title: Ser

House_Greenfield.name: House Greenfield
coat of arms: A white double-tressure, on a green field
Vert, a double-tressure argent
House_Greenfield.title: The Knight of Greenfield

House_Hetherspoon.name: House Hetherspoon
coat of arms: An oak spoon within a white cartouche, on a field of orange and black diamonds
(Lozengy tenn  and sable, on a cartouche argent an oak spoon proper)
House_Hetherspoon.title: Ser

House_Lorch.name: House Lorch
coat of arms: A black manticore on a white field, beneath a crimson chief with three gold coins
Argent, a manticore passant sable, on a chief gules three bezants

House_Peckledon.name: House Peckledon
coat of arms: Ten purple stars, on a yellow field
Or, ten mullets, 4, 3, 2, 1, purpure

House_Ruttiger.name: House Ruttiger
coat of arms: An orange engrailed bend, on a black field
Sable, a bend tenn  engrailed

House_Swyft.name: House Swyft
coat of arms: A blue bantam rooster, on a yellow field
Or, a cock close azure
title: Knight of Cornfield
Lord of Cornfield (formerly)
[N 1]

House_Vikary.name: House Vikary
coat of arms: Quarterly: a red boar's head on a white field; beneath a gold bend sinister, a silver lion rampant regardant with a forked tail, with gold teeth and claws, on a red field
Quarterly, first and fourth, argent, a boar's head couped gules, second and third, gules, a lion rampant regardant queue-forch  argent, armed and langued or, debruised by a bend sinister of the last

House_Westford.name: House Westford
coat of arms: A black dog on blue
Azure, a dog sable
House_Westford.lord: Mors Westford (exiled to the Night's Watch)

House_Yew.name: House Yew
coat of arms: A golden longbow between two crimson flaunches, on a white field
Argent, a longbow or between two flaunches gules

House_Spicer.name: House Spicer
coat of arms: Three black pepperpots on a saffron bend, across a field of green and silver stripes
Paly vert and argent, three pepperpots sable on a bend tenn
House_Spicer.title: Lord of Castamere
House_Spicer.founded: In or between 244 AC and 267 AC

House_Parren.name: House Parren
coat of arms: Per saltire: burgundy and white stripes; a black lion's head on a gold field
Per saltire, the first paly gules and argent, the second or, a lion's head erased sable

House_Reyne.name: House Reyne
coat of arms: A red lion rampant regardant with a forked tail, with gold tongue and claws, on a silver field
Argent, a lion rampant regardant queue-fourch  gules, armed and langued or
House_Reyne.title: Lord of Castamere

House_Tarbeck.name: House Tarbeck
coat of arms: A seven-pointed star, parts silver parts blue, on a silver and blue field
Gyronny argent and azure, a star of seven points counterchanged
House_Tarbeck.title: Lord of Tarbeck Hall
